paragraphs.text: Iroh frequently played the tsungi horn.

paragraphs.body: The tsungi horn is a ${link_0} instrument used in the traditional music of the ${link_1}. The curved and highly polished horn is cast from metal, and is believed to have originated in the ${link_2}.
paragraphs.text: The tsungi horn is a musical instrument used in the traditional music of the four nations. The curved and highly polished horn is cast from metal, and is believed to have originated in the Fire Nation.

paragraphs.body: The real life counterparts in terms of appearance to the tsungi horn are the sousaphone and the French horn. ${link_0} created the instrument's unique sound by superimposing characteristics of the trombone to the duduk, a double reed instrument from Armenia.
paragraphs.text: The real life counterparts in terms of appearance to the tsungi horn are the sousaphone and the French horn. The Track Team created the instrument's unique sound by superimposing characteristics of the trombone to the duduk, a double reed instrument from Armenia.
